maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Alright, here we go.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Хорошо, начинаем.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: This is the part of the cavern that got breached by those darn guards.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Это та часть пещеры, которая была обнаружена этими проклятыми охранниками.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Here, take the chip.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Вот, возьми чип.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: \v[item.344.name]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: \v[item.344.name]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Once I move the box here, the chip will start tracking your movement.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Как только я отодвину этот ящик, чип начнёт отслеживать твоё перемещение.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Your goal is to find a way to the exit south of here without a guard noticing you.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Твоя цель - найти выход к югу отсюда, чтобы охранники тебя не заметили.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Talk to me when ya ready, capiche?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Поговори со мной, когда будешь готова, ясно?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: And be prepared, because I won't let ya go until ya done, woman.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: И будь готова, потому что я не отпущу тебя, пока ты не закончишь, женщина.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Oh wait, before my dad yells at me again. Here's a \c[3]Smokaway\c[0] and some \c[3]Intel on the Guards\c[0] our men found.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Ой, подожди, пока мой папа снова не накричал на меня. Вот \c[3]дымовуха\c[0], и немного \c[3]данных на охранников\c[0], найденных нашими людьми.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: \v[item.343.name]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: \v[item.343.name]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: \v[combat.name.jungle/special/guard]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: \v[combat.name.jungle/special/guard]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Use the Smokaway when you get caught, you'll be able to run back here and I'll close the box, got it?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Используй дымовуху, когда тебя поймают, ты сможешь вернуться сюда, и я закрою проход, уяснила?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Good, ready when you are.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Хорошо, дай знать, как будешь готова.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Ready?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Готова?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Alright, talk to me again if ya want to chicken out.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Хорошо, поговори со мной ещё раз, если струсишь.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Also, don't attack the guards in any way. Don't wanna raise suspicion, right?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Кроме того, не нападай на охранников. Нам тут лишние подозрения не нужны.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Use \c[3]Direct Link\c[0] to call me once you're through.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Используй \c[3]прямую связь\c[0], чтобы позвонить мне, как только закончишь.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [мотает головой]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Don't waste my time woman. Get on with it already.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Не трать моё время, женщина. Приступай уже.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Yes
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Да

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: No
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Нет

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Wanna Stop?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Хочешь остановиться?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: I knew ya would chicken out.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Я знал, что ты струсишь.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [мотает головой]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Then don't stand here and find a way woman.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Тогда не стой здесь и найди путь, женщина.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Yes
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Да

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: No
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Нет

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Halt! Who goes there!?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Стой! Кто идёт!?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Mh... Oh, it's you. Did ya find a way?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Эм... А, это ты. Нашла путь?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Finally! Only took ya \v[map.retiresNeeded] tries.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Наконец-то! Хватило всего \v[map.retiresNeeded] раз.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Finally! And it only took you one try. I'm actually impressed.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Наконец-то! И это заняло всего одну попытку. Я на самом деле впечатлён.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Give me a minute, I'll use the same way using the tracker chip I gave you.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Дай мне минуту, я пойду тем же путём, используя чип отслеживания, который дал тебе.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Damn, woman, was this really the only way?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Чёрт, женщина, это был единственный путь?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: So much walking... \.\.\. Thankfully, I don't have to carry the goods. That would be just awful.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Так много ходьбы... \.\.\. К счастью, мне не придётся нести товар. Это было бы просто ужасно.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Don't give me that look, will ya?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Не смотри на меня так, ладно?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Ya can go back to my dad with the tracker chip and get your reward.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Ты можешь вернуться к моему отцу с чипом отслеживания и получить свою награду.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Ya can keep the \v[item.343.name] and explore this cavern if ya want.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Я могу оставить дымовуху, если захочешь исследовать эту пещеру.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Also, be a good girl and make sure to tell him I helped a lot, gotcha?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Кроме того, будь хорошей девочкой, и скажи ему, что я очень помог, улавливаешь?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: I *knew* I could count on ya. Now off you go, the rest is just a long small tunnel anyway.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Я *знал*, что могу рассчитывать на тебя. А теперь иди, оставшаяся часть - это всего лишь длинный узкий тоннель.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: [мотает головой]

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: You... what? Come on... at least have some mercy, will ya?
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Ты... что? Да ладно... прояви милосердие, а?

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Screw it then. Off you go. I can handle the rest without you.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Да пошло оно. Можешь идти. С остальным я справлюсь без тебя.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Yes
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Да

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: No
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Нет

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: What are you still here for? Go to my dad with the chip already.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Что ты здесь до сих пор делаешь? Иди уже с чипом к моему отцу.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Well look who it is.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Посмотрите, кто пришёл.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Hi...
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Привет...

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: Thanks to ya, I'm now to stand here almost all day watching the carriers bringing in the goods.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Благодаря тебе, я теперь почти весь день стою здесь, и наблюдаю за тем, как курьеры ввозят товар.

maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.orig: So thanks for that, really nice of ya.
maps/jungle/caves/smuggle-route-2.json/e.text: Так что спасибо за это, очень любезно с твоей стороны.
